Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers depend on their pitching staff, particularly Tarik Skubal, who has been brilliant in the postseason.
The Guardians have a strong bullpen with Emmanuel Clase and Cade Smith, who can close out games effectively.
Manager AJ Hinch's unique pitching strategies have been crucial for the Tigers' success.
Manager Stephen Vogt's leadership will be important for the Guardians in the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is a rematch of the season series, where the Guardians won 7-6.
The Tigers were 24th in home runs and rely heavily on pitching, while the Guardians have struggled with scoring runs.
